extendedInfo.description: Ares Shopping List, formerly called Ares Marketlist, is a software developed to managing grocery lists. Through this application you can create custom lists to help remember the items to be purchased.Ares Shopping List has the following features:- Possibility to add / edit lists- Registration of products with categories- Checking of purchased items - Undo checked items- Inclusion of product price- Total value of purchased products- Registration of markets- Backup / Restore database- Generation of reports- ThemesThe software is designed for those who want a simple and flexible management of grocery lists, with no need to register several fields that will not be used.For translation errors, please send us e-mail.Keywords: supermarket, market, shopping list, grocery list, marketlist

reviews.title: A Good App
reviews.comment: I like it, but it would be nice if one could add the aisle number that an item is on so that one could better plan their shopping trip.  It\'d also be nice if one could scan an item as well as have a field for size.  It\'d also be nice if there was a desktop version so that one could create a list on their home computer and then import it into their smartphone/tablet. It\'s nice that sales tax was added so that when one buys an item that is taxed it\'ll be added to the final total. But I think that adding the aisle number an item is on instead of just making the list alphabetical would really help.
reviews.author: Herman F. Ebeling, Jr.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Add or edit entire list. Moves items to the bottom and out of your way once you tap them to show item is in your cart. App has great color schemes to help encourage you to follow your list and simple plus organized fashion to keep you on track. Add your own category names and own product name and info.
reviews.author: Stacie Buckle

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: Can\'t even add your own categories or edit default ones
reviews.author: A Google User
